Commander Kbaldir: You definitely have the look of a seasoned warrior. I can tell, you and I have seen our share of battles, haven't we? Hehe, one of these days we'll have to share a few pints. But matters of state come first. I have a favor to ask if you're willing. [Quest _10282_ToTheSeedOfAnnihilation 32733-02.htm|Ask about the favor.]
